title: r/Entitledparents Karen Tries To Steal My House!
description: r/Entitledparents In today's episode, OP has a crazy encounter with his entitled aunt who actually tries to steal their family home. OP lives in China with his family, but his parents briefly move to America for a few months. While they're away, OP's entitled aunt tries to scam OP's family into giving her their house! They fight against the Karen in court and OP gets sweet justice! Be sure to follow for more daily Reddit content!
dc:creator: rSlash Reads Reddit
